Package zone.berna.datatablesajax.request

Class TableRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • zone.berna.datatablesajax.request.TableRequest

  • public class TableRequest
extends java.lang.Object
    The object that represents a request for data from DataTables.

    Usually there's no need to read or write to properties of this class, since all manipulation is done by TableResponseGenerator.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  TableRequest.Column
      Represents a table column.
      static class  TableRequest.Order
      Represents ordering information (column index and ordering direction).
      static class  TableRequest.Search
      Represents a search term.
